answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hi Maggie, 
Unfortunately I was not able to find any reviews on the Knowledge Network of the specific software you mentioned in your question. However there was a very similar question on the Knowledge Network a few years ago with many answers and you can follow up with those city managers to see how their choices are working out and if they have switched to one of your software choices. http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/kn/Question/20990
I hope you find this useful!
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

answers.author: David Evertsen
answers.text:
We have never heard about either of these two vendors. They aren't on our top 10 list of major players (OSSI, New World, FinTrack and  others). Contact Barry Strock - he is the nation's foremost expert on government & public safety software and he is vendor agnostic. He is a wealth of information and it will be well worth your call.  Hi can be reached 518.461.5009

author: Maggie Darr
text:
Hello,  I am seeking public safety departments that have used or currently use for their scheduling needs either: 
1) VCS - POSS or FIRES 
2) InTime Solutions
My organization is choosing between these two vendors and would like to speak with some references that weren't provided by the companies.
Thank you in advance.
title: Public safety scheduling software vendors
